method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pot, melt the butter and add the breadcrumbs.
Toast the breadcrumbs until golden brown.
Drain the cooked pasta and mix in the cheese until melted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Form the cheesy bow tie pasta mixture into bite-sized balls.
Coat each ball with the toasted breadcrumbs.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.
Serve as a tasty snack or appetizer.
